price: (45) They said, "Our Lord, indeed we are afraid that he will hasten [punishment] against us or that he will transgress."
arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفۡرُطَ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوۡ أَن يَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālā rabbanā innanā nakhāfu an yafruṭa ʿalaynā aw an yaṭghā
